section.title: Order by path or name

warning.para: Ordering by jcr:path or jcr:name does not supported.

section.para: There are two ways to order results, when path may be used as criteria:

listitem.para: Order by property with the NAME or PATH value type (JCR supports it)
Order by jcr:path or jcr:name - sort by the exact path or name of node (JCR does not support it).

section.para: If no order specification is supplied in the query statement, implementations may support document order on the result nodes (see the 6.6.4.2 Document Order section of JSR-170), and it is sorted by order number.
By default, (if query does not contain any ordering statements) result nodes are sorted by document order.
section.programlisting: SELECT * FROM nt:unstructured WHERE jcr:path LIKE 'testRoot/%'
